name: Paula Sauer
text: They have custom made two doors for my new house and I couldn’t be happier with the finished product. Solid construction and beautifully finished!!! When we finish our basement, I will be ordering more doors from them. PS: they did an excellent job of boxing them up for shipment to Michigan so there was no damage during transit.

name: Albert Epshteyn
text: We got barn doors from Luke on Etsy, and he made us matching shelves that we used around or fireplace. They came out great. Thanks for the great work!

name: Annie Johnson
text: Very friendly family business that carries unique furniture pieces and offers customization. They are busy (for good reason) so make an appointment beforehand if you are looking for something specific.

name: Leigh Peters
text: Linda,  who creates the wreaths and monogram has an amazing insight into what is wanted in the design you have in mind.  She takes her time and walks you through every step of the way.  I am so excited and pleased with the items she has created for me.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. yes, Linda is amazing! We are so thankful to have her! Hope to see you soon.

name: Janice Gladney
text: Had a good shopping experience. Bought a little something, something for myself. Got a very nice gift for my sister's birthday. The sales ladies were very nice and helpful. Going back again.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in.  We hope to see you again real soon.  We wish you and your sister a very HAPPY BIRTHDAY !!!

name: Jeanell Perkins
text: Such a neat shop! The ladies are great, helpful, and knowledgeable about the store. So many awesome things for everyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your comments.  We hope to see you again real soon :)

name: Amy Damm
text: Great place. If you are looking for something unusual, vintage, monogramming, etc this is the place to go.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  Hope to see you soon!

name: Laura Owens
text: I have been here twice in the last year and both times the owner refused to sell me something she had out in the store!  I really wanted to love this place, but the owner makes it impossible.  Why have things out you refuse to sell.  I tried to see what she would take for a skillet that was displayed with others and she wouldn’t work with me at all.  What a pathetic excuse for an antique store.  I will NEVER be back.

resp.text: Laura, I apologize that I did not have the skillet priced.  I never refused to sell item to you.  I simply had not had time to clean and research before pricing, as I explained.  I would have been happy to take the skillet down from display and researched, after I finished up with the customer I was assisting.  I apologize for the misunderstanding.  ~ Melissa

name: Pamela H
text: Love, Love, Love this place! Loads of new finds. The owner is amazing and super helpful. Super cute shop. A must visit!!

resp.text: Pamela, we love love love your enthusiasm for our shop! We hope you took home a special item from your visit with us. Looking forward to seeing you soon! -Melissa Smith, Owner

name: Don Julio
text: Great place with a little of everything...Owner is very kind and knowledgeable...makes some art herself...Ill be back

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind comments! hope to see you again real soon 😊

name: Scott Mains
text: Wonderful selection of rough cut and live edge wood. Definitely worth your time to wander through. Super friendly staff!

name: Pinson Patriot
text: Supper nice and very unique furniture.

name: David McMahon
text: I purchased a beautiful desk from Alabama Sawyer and I love it. It's extraordinarily well-designed and constructed, and I will have it for years. Excellent communication with the company as well. Thanks!

name: Stephen Hicks
text: Innovative design sold me on the Sputnik side table.

name: Anthony Cook
text: Your sales consultant Veronica Turner is amazing! So patient while I was trying to find the perfect sectional for my home. Delivery was top notch. They even put felt pads on the footings of they sectional that they brought in themselves. Makes me wish I had bought from Havertys years ago. Will definitely return when I need to upgrade.

resp.text: Hi Anthony, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to Veronica here at Havertys Furniture! We always strive to provide top quality service to every guest, and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience here at Havertys Furniture!

name: Ronald Edmond
text: Janey Jemison was awesome I want to thank her for the time she gave my Wife. Here honesty and cincerity she gave us. What a warm and beautiful person. We are happy to have a new friend.

resp.text: Hi Ronald, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our team! If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out!

name: Terry Anderson
text: Salesperson was fantastic and patient with us. Finance Office very knowledgeable on how the company financing works

resp.text: Terry, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our team! We do hope we can be of assistance in the future. Take care!

name: Lalita Holder
text: Customer service from the moment of arrival. I liked the fact that the representative showed us items we requested but also allowed a bit of freedom for us to browse a bit on our own & was available & nearby.

resp.text: Hi Lalita, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! Thank you so much again for your feedback! We hope you have a great day!

name: Jerry Bousard
text: Services was excellent!  Follow up was excellent with Darwin Davis!  Looking forward to receiving our purchase.

resp.text: Hi Jerry, thank you so much for your positive comments about Havertys Furniture! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: John Murphy
text: Darwin was fantastic!  Very knowledgeable and great to work with - definitely an asset to Haverty’s!

resp.text: John, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to Darwin here at Havertys Furniture! If you have any further questions, please give us a call. We're always happy to help!

name: Allison Harbin
text: Our sales person Sheila was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. Gave us time to look and didn't feel pressured to buy anything. We will definitely use her and Havertys again!!

resp.text: Hi Allison, thank you so much for your positive comments about Havertys Furniture! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Patricia Blackwell
text: The two delivery guys were wonderful. They took care of my home like it was theirs. They also realized that with the buckboard my bed was way to tall for me. It was as high as my shoulders. So they took care of taking it back and making sure it came off my billing. They were very nice.

resp.text: Hi Patricia, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Tricia Marshall
text: We had a very helpful sales person.  My father is 77 years old.  The salesman was patient and provided all of the information we needed to make the right choice on a lift recliner.

resp.text: Hi Tricia, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you. Take care!

name: Fatimus Patimus
text: Knew what I wanted and went in for a painless shopping experience.  Very friendly staff and beautiful products.

resp.text: Hi Fatimus, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Chelsea Miller
text: I was checked on multiple times and felt that my needs were catered to!

resp.text: Hi Chelsea, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We hope to see you soon!

name: Rhonda Allen
text: I asked for Denise as I entered the door. She, as with my last purchase, provided EXCELLENT assistance throughout my shopping experience. I tried out quality furniture to my liking. She was beyond patient while I finally made my selection, providing samples, pricing, computer images, and visual pillow displays with furniture. Great job!!

resp.text: Rhonda, we're happy you found Denise to be so supportive during your experience here at Havertys Furniture. We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Natalyn Howard
text: Veronica was very thorough and patient. She was able to handle all of my needs and answer all of my questions. She was a pleasure to work with.

name: Kim DeVilbiss
text: Veronica Turner was very attentive. She listened to what we were wanting and showed us all of the options. She was extremely helpful in the checkout process and ensured that we received the discounts that we were entitled! Won’t shop for furniture anywhere else. Haverty’s has a tremendous selection to choose from for every room in the house.

resp.text: Kim, your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us. Until the next time we meet, take care!

text: After we were greeted,  we were left alone which made the experience better!

I spent a couple of weeks looking for an entertainment console buy couldn't find what I wanted. Thought of Havertys and found exactly what I wanted there..solid wood construction with no particle board. It's much easier picking out a TV over what to set it on.

text: Our Sales consultant, Alana Wiley-Walker was awesome! She helped us pick out 2 couches; she was very helpful, but not pushy. My husband and I both really enjoyed working with her!

name: Darryl Morin
text: Excellent customer service!  Both Darwin and Lexi were great with suggestions, listening to what I had in mind and wanted, and were a tremendous help!!  Havertys has an excellent selection of furniture for every room.  I went in looking for dining room, living room, and home office furniture and they hit a grand slam with everything I was looking for and needed!  I highly recommend taking a look!  Everyone there is kind, friendly, and extremely helpful!

resp.text: Darryl, your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive furniture shopping experience. Have a great day!

name: Cynthia Coleman
text: The customer service was exceptional. My sales person was attentive and knowledgeable. This is my go to place for furnishings.

name: Hampton Inn Saraland
text:
I love Haverty furniture but the customer service in the past has been horrible. I came in Sunday just to look at the furniture i was gonna order online because service  I had gotten in the past was  just that bad. but to my surprise i was greeted by a real nice lady who helped me with my order.
I decided to place my order with her instead of online.I can only imagine the business you all lose because of poor service. I was very happy with my salesperson today.

resp.text: Hello Hampton, thank you; we appreciate your feedback! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

text: The sales rep was ver y knowledgeable on styles and prices. She was patient and ecplained all options.

name: ohmgirl Angela
text: Scott was awesome and very helpful. He went above and beyond in customer service. It was pouring rain and he brought my husband an umbrella to use so that he could pull the car around so me and my 6 yr old son didn't have to get wet and even walk us out. He answered all out questions, he was helpful and friendly without any pressure to buy. We decided on a lovely sofa set and Scott went over all the available options to help us pick the right on for our space. Over all I give Scott 5 stars and the over all store a 4.5. As of now I would more than likely do business with them again in the future.

name: Deborah Turberville
text: Alana was extreme helpful and cheerful. We found just he perfect sleeper sofa and with such great service, we will have it in ample time for Thanksgiving guests!

resp.text: Hi Deborah! We're so happy we were able to help you out! Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Richard Griswold
text: The store location was convenient, clean, and in good repair . The Staff greeted me as I walked in and Ms Peggy questioned me about my intended purchase and helped me decide on the right size, color, and distribution of my new Living Room group . I enjoyed the ability to see the contrast of colors on Ms Peggy's computer, that was so enlightening . I will return to Haverty's and I will look for Ms Peggy !!  Thank you for your kind help !

resp.text: Richard, we are very happy we could provide you with a positive experience! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day!

name: Holly Coleman
text: My husband wants input on the furniture we select but is out of town right now. Sheila Griffin went out of her way to provide me with photos and prices of each of the furniture pieces I like that I want my husband to see. She gave me printed information about all of it and also emailed it to me so that I could email it to my husband to consider. Of course, she told me about the sales prices and delivery. Sheila took excellent care of me, and I would recommend her to any potential customer.

name: Logan Brown
text: I don't usually write reviews, but I had too for this one! I had dealt with Veronica Turner, and she was nothing short of exceptional! From the minute I walked in she was very helpful. She showed all my options (it was all neatly arranged and the store had a easier layout then the other furniture store I went too first). I had plans to go to a few more stores after this to look around, but I didn't! She was great to deal with and very helpful. I was in and out in around 20 minutes! Picked out my bedroom set, got approved for the great financing offer they had going on, and set up my delivery. I highly recommend asking for Veronica!

resp.text: We’re thrilled to receive such positive feedback regarding your Havertys purchase! Thank you for sharing your experience with Veronica and we hope you enjoy your new bedroom set.

text: Very impressed

name: Brenda Chisholm
text: Went in looking for a specfic cabinet but didn't find it however we did find a beautiful dining room set.  Tashayla was a big help in our decision to buy she was very helpful and informative.  We had to go home and measure our room to make sure we had enough room for dining set comfortably.  Upon reentering the store to make the purchase final Tashyla saw my husband an I and meet us and ask "is it going to work for you?"  We purchased and are excitedly awaiting our delivery on Wednesday.  It was a pleasure to do business with Havertys.

name: J Schleigh
text: Nice people. Good service. Need better pricing for a Labor Day sale.

name: Angela Weaver
text: After being charged $300 for delivery I was told that it wouldn't  be a problem to receive deliver of my furniture after 4:00 pm on Monday, after I got home from work, then found out that, that was not true when an automated system called to confirm the deliver between 9:00 am and 2:00 pm. After speaking with Darwin the salesman we had initial dealt with I was told it was because they only deliver to baldwin county on Mondays and that there was no way to say what exact time they would show up. So if you live anywhere in baldwin county or further I would definitely not suggest doing business with them. Also it seems like they will say whatever to make the sale and get you on the hook. $300 for delivery???? That's insane especially for the terrible service I have gotten with trying to nail down a time for delivery. For the price it is not worth the headache

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at Azalea Center. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (251) 341-3349. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Leo’s Tarot
text: Your welcome

resp.text: Hi Taraneshia, we are glad we could help! We hope to see you soon!

name: Denise Walker
text: Veronica is a wonderful salesperson . They had a good variety of the furniture we were looking for, and the pricing was very competitive.

resp.text: Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day!

name: Edward McMillian
text: experienced, professional, sales person

resp.text: Edward, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our team! We hope to be of service to you again in the future. Best wishes, Havertys Furniture

name: Stephanie Durkac
text: Always a great experience when purchasing furniture from Havertys.  Great customer service and quality furniture.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback regarding your visit to Havertys! We strive to give every customer a pleasant experience with excellent customer service and high-quality home furnishings.

name: Traclyn Dukes
text: I received  the greatest  service ever  I will be shop there from now on

name: Machelle Odom
text: Real elegant and nice comfortable furniture and it good quality for the money

resp.text: Hi Machelle, thank you so much for your positive comments about Havertys Furniture! We hope to see you soon!

name: Clarice Hall-Black
text: Not a review writer but Darwin is an excellent salesman.  Thanks so much for your help!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Laura Stevens
text:
When spending thousands of dollars on furniture you would expect professional, reliable service. I was very disappointed with our store visit over the weekend dealing with a manager on duty who quoted us Havertys policies and procedures.
Now our delivery is 4 hours late ( past the 3 hour window) I only found this out because I called to check the status of the delivery. I will be having my furniture delivered after 9pm (3:45- 5:45  was orginal time window) which is unexceptable! While on the phone with customer service I was quoted Havertys policies around delivery and promised a delivery time of 7:40 pm.  It is now 9pm and they still have not showed up and customer service is closed. If I could do over I would have spent our money elsewhere. What should have been a fun buying experience has been a stressful one.  I do not recommend Haverty's and will not be buying from this company again.

name: Sandra James
text: Great customer experience!!!

resp.text: Sandra, we are delighted to hear that you had a great shopping experience with our team! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: John Steiner
text: Great help

resp.text: Hi John, we're so happy we were able to help you out! We do hope we can be of assistance in the future. Take care!

name: Porsche Wilson
text: Great service

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we did. Your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us. We hope you have a great day!

name: Joe Biancardi
text: Wow. Really expensive.

name: Linda McDougald
text: quick and easy

resp.text: Hello Linda, we're glad you enjoyed your visit with us! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything more we can do. Take care!

name: John Drown
text:
Barry just delivered our new pool lounges in his 92" truck.

That man looks like Kurt Russel, drives like Nic Cage and was as polite as I imagine Morgan Freeman to be.

He was the best part of this whole process.

Thank you Barry!

name: Kaite Mccoy
text:
Great company with great customer service! They go above and beyond :)
Daniel D. was  most helpful!

name: Matthew Kleinman
text: Nothing but great things to say! Purchased $16k worth of furniture this year. Everyone at Leisure Creations was outstanding from start to finish! Quality was great, shipping was fast! The Next time I buy exterior furniture Leisure Creations will be my first choice!

name: The world Of Chelsea Ridge neighborhood friends
text: Amazing, beautiful furniture. VERY happy. Our outdoor space looks amazing.

name: Catherine Bauer
text: I have placed multiple orders with Leisure Creations for various projects I'm working on and I have had great service each and every time!

name: C. G. M (ThaTruthSeka)
text: "For Such Creative & Engineering Minds Of The Artist's Community, I'm Anxious To Unwrap The Truth...About The Uninviting Location 🤔."  The Resemblance Isn't Too Far From A Correctional Facility; Look-A-Like.  But, Hey They're Raking In That Dough.  Very Simple + Fashionable Designers.  Thanks Kindly For Contributing To Our Cool & Vibrant New Upgrades✌🏿.

name: Courtneay Freeman
text: Great to the trade manufacture of outdoor furniture!

text: Beautiful, durable products and great customer service!
